Directions: Generously pump foaming cleanser into hands. Gently
book: 2950-Fre Cleanse Me Foaming Micellar Cleanser & Makeup Remover

chunk:
into hands. Gently massage onto wet skin and then rinse off. This product can be used on facial skin and on lips. To remove eye makeup, add a small amount of product to a cotton or reusable pad and gently wipe closed eyes. Avoid the delicate eye area. For best results, use twice a day.
